channel.title: CoARiJ on Memo Tut
channel.description: Recent content in CoARiJ on Memo Tut

item.title: [Python] Read a large number of securities reports with COTOHA
item.description: #Introduction I don’t know what a financial report is and I don’t know what it says, and even if I read the contents of a particular year of a company I want to know, I do not understand unless I compare it with other companies / other years: frowning2: So let’s explore how to read a large number of securities reports using COTOHA: wink: *For basic usage of COTOHA, see @gossy5454’s Article
